snippet: A federal judge halted same-sex marriages in Wisconsin, a week after she struck down the state’s same-sex marriage ban as unconstitutional.
abstract: Federal District Court Judge Barbara B Crabb orders halt to same-sex marriages in Wisconsin, week after she struck down state's same-sex marriage ban as unconstitutional, move that allowed more than 500 couples to wed; ruling prohibits same-sex marriages in state while appeal is pending.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge halted same-sex marriages in Wisconsin, a week after she struck down the state’s same-sex marriage ban as unconstitutional.

headline.main: Judge Halts Gay Marriage in Wisconsin
headline.print_headline: Judge Halts Gay Marriage in Wisconsin

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
